summary: The class constructs a quantum‑volume model circuit composed of layers of Haar‑random two‑qubit SU(4) operations arranged on randomly chosen bipartitions of the qubits, enabling the creation of standardized random circuits for the quantum‑volume benchmark.
business_intent: Supply a ready‑to‑use circuit generator that lets users evaluate and compare the computational capability of quantum processors through the quantum‑volume metric.
